short_summary: Programme Solutions Innovatrices Canada - Appel de forces de proposition
description: The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a call for proposals on behalf of the Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) Innovative Solutions Canada (ISC) program. The program seeks to create a pool of potential solutions that Canada may select from to address various challenges facing federal departments and agencies.
tags: Manufacturing technology research and development services
